item.title: Weekly Review #03 - Health, Goals and the Rhythm of Life
item.description: 'Here After Us - Mayday' Preface It seems that every time I start with the title, I try to set a theme for the past week. Sometimes it’s not that easy to summarize, but I still persist in doing so. Perhaps this way, life will be like a series of chapters pieced together, and when looking back after a long time, it will feel like a fulfilling book. This piece is a record and reflection of my life from 2022-07-04 to 2022-07-10.
